text: "Chandelier" is a 2014 song by Australian singer-songwriter Sia and is the lead single from her sixth studio album 1000 Forms of Fear. It topped the single charts in France, Greece and Poland. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Lebanon, New Zealand, Norway, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States. It is an electropop song. The song was nominated for an Grammy Award in 2015. The music video features American dancer Maddie Ziegler. Category:2014 songs Category:Sia songs Category:Electropop songs
title: Chandelier (song)
